name: FREE UX/UI Design Roadmap (2025)
description: Ready to become a UX/UI designer in 2025? This simple Notion template guide is here to help! Perfect for beginners or those looking to launch their career this year, this guide gives you an easy-to-follow checklist and all the free resources you need to learn UX/UI design.What's included: ✦ Step-by-Step Learning: everything is organized in a simple checklist way so you can learn step by step. Tick them off as you go from the basics to advanced design stuff. ✦ Free Learning Resources: You'll get
features: Can I use this with the free Notion account?Yes, you can use the free Notion personal account. You can sign up to Notionhere.; Can I customize the font, styling and icons in this template?Yes! Notion is the best tool for your use case because it is incredibly flexible.; Is this light/dark mode supported?Yes! You can switch between light/dark mode without affecting your Notion workspace. Official guide by Notionhere.; How do I contact you?If you encounter any issues, email me atdyniza@uxdyniza.com
